channel.title: Looking for Item defs 562/668
channel.description: I am looking for item defintions for rsps 562/668 i am using project dungeon fest everything works but i cant wear items because i need working itemsdefs. Can someone post their item definitions here? I will rep++

item.title: Looking for Item defs 562/668
item.dc:creator: @modzilla modzilla
item.description:
@modzilla wrote:

This one? or u need the one with like 100,000 characters that i cannot post

[code]package com.rs2hd.model;

import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.FileInputStream;
import java.io.RandomAccessFile;
import java.nio.ByteBuffer;
import java.nio.channels.FileChannel;
import java.nio.channels.FileChannel.MapMode;
import java.util.List;

import com.rs2hd.util.XStreamUtil;
import com.rs2hd.GameEngine;
import com.rs2hd.util.log.Logger;

/**

  • Item Definition class
  • @author Graham & Dragonkk & Apache Ah64

*/
public class ItemDefinition {

public static final int SIZE = 22000; //amtitems

private static final ItemDefinition[] definitions = new ItemDefinition[SIZE];
//disabled load from bin. loads from xml
@SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
public static void load() throws IOException {
	/*File f = new File("data/itemDefinitions.bin");
	if(f.exists()) {
		loadFromBin(f);
	} else {*/
		List<ItemDefinition> defs = (List<ItemDefinition>) XStreamUtil.getXStream().fromXML(new FileInputStream("data/itemDefinitions.xml"));
		for(ItemDefinition def : defs)
			if(def != null)
				if(def.id > -1)
					definitions[def.id] = def;
		/*f.createNewFile();
		pack();*/
		Logger.getInstance().info("Loaded " + defs.size() + " item definitions.");
	//}
}

public static ItemDefinition forId(int id) {
	if(id == -1 || id >= SIZE) {
		return null;
	}
	ItemDefinition def = definitions[id];
	if(def == null || def.getId() == -1) {
		return new ItemDefinition(id);//definitions[1];
	} 
	return def;
}

public ItemDefinition() { //normal
        examine = "NO DEFINITIONS DUMB!";
	price = new ItemPrice();
}

public ItemDefinition(int id) { //empty with our id
	this.id = id;
        examine = "NO DEFINITIONS DUMB!";
	price = new ItemPrice();
}
public static void pack() throws IOException {
	Logger.getInstance().info("Packing new packed item definitions...");
	RandomAccessFile raf = new RandomAccessFile("data/itemDefinitions.bin", "rw");
	raf.writeShort(SIZE);
	for(int i = 0; i < SIZE; i++) {
		ItemDefinition def = definitions[i];
		if(def == null) {
			raf.writeShort(-1);
			continue;
		}
		raf.writeShort(def.id);
		raf.writeByte(def.isStackable() ? 1 : 0);
		raf.writeByte(def.isNoted() ? 1 : 0);
		raf.writeDouble(def.iventoryWeight);
		raf.writeDouble(def.wearingWeight);
		raf.writeByte(def.bonus.length);
		for(int j = 0; j < def.bonus.length; j++) {
			raf.writeShort(def.bonus[j]);
		}
		raf.writeBytes(def.name);
		raf.writeByte(0);
		raf.writeBytes(def.examine);
		raf.writeByte(0);
	}
}

private static void loadFromBin(File f) throws IOException {
	FileChannel channel = new RandomAccessFile(f, "r").getChannel();
	ByteBuffer buffer = channel.map(MapMode.READ_ONLY, 0, channel.size());
	int size = buffer.getShort();
	int mySize = 0;
	for(int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
		int id = buffer.getShort();
		if(id == -1) {
			continue;
		}
		ItemDefinition def = new ItemDefinition();
		def.id = id;
		def.stackable = buffer.get() == 1;
		def.noted = buffer.get() == 1;
		def.iventoryWeight = buffer.getDouble();
		def.wearingWeight = buffer.getDouble();
		int length = buffer.get();
		def.bonus = new int[length];
		for(int j = 0; j < length; j++) {
			def.bonus[j] = buffer.getShort();
		}
		def.name = readString(buffer);
		def.examine = readString(buffer);
		definitions[id] = def;
		mySize++;
	}
	Logger.getInstance().info("Loaded " + mySize + " item definitions.");
	channel.close();
	channel = null;
	buffer = null;
}

public static String readString(ByteBuffer buf) {
	StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
	byte b;
	while((b = buf.get()) != 0 && buf.remaining() > 0) {
		sb.append((char) b);
	}
	return sb.toString();
}

public static class ItemPrice {
	private int minPrice;
	private int maxPrice;
	private int normPrice;

	public int getMinimumPrice() {
		return minPrice;
	}

	public int getMaximumPrice() {
		return maxPrice;
	}

	public int getNormalPrice() {
		return normPrice;
	}
}
public ItemPrice getPrice() {
	return price;
}

private int[] bonus;
private String examine;
private int id;
private boolean stackable;
private String name;
private boolean noted;
private ItemPrice price;
private int equipId;

private double iventoryWeight;
private double wearingWeight;

public double getWeightIventory() {
	return iventoryWeight;
}

public double getWeightWearing() {
	return wearingWeight;
}

public int getEquipId() {
	return GameEngine.equip.getEquipId(id);
}

public int[] getBonuses() {
	return bonus;
}

public int getBonus(int id) {
	return bonus[id];
}

public String getExamine() {
	return examine;
}

public int getId() {
	return id;
}

public String getName() {
	return name;
}

public boolean isNoted() {
	return noted || examine.toLowerCase().startsWith("swap");
}

public boolean isStackable() {
	return stackable || noted;
}

public int getMinimumPrice() {
	return GameEngine.prices.getMinimumPrice(id);
}

public int getMaximumPrice() {
	return GameEngine.prices.getMaximumPrice(id);
}

public int getNormalPrice() {
	return GameEngine.prices.getNormalPrice(id);
}

}
[/code]

Read full topic
